Giuseppe Caruso (December 22, 1935 – May 28, 2018), best known as Pippo Caruso, was an Italian composer, conductor and music arranger. He was born in Belpasso, Italy. Caruso was known for composing movie soundtracks, such as "Kill Johnny Ringo" and "Maladolescenza". He also conducted the score of the television series "Canzonissima 1973".
Caruso died in Passo Corese, Italy on May 28, 2018 at the age of 82.
